turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order at Bella Luna Pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! how many pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted two medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: both medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oops, got that. what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, okay. So for the first one, I would like a ham and pineapple. And on the second one, I would like mushrooms, green peppers, and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a gluten free crust on both pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you please repeat that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you. so your order is:

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 medium pizzas. for the first: ham and pineapple. for the second: mushroom, green peppers and onions with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! your total will be $28 plus tax.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at Bela Luna's in 45 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you so much for your help. I really appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, I will.
